name: default-plus-whitelist
description: Limited network mode with skill-specific domain additions

custom_domains.purpose: GitHub release asset downloads (SpaCy NLP models, ML weights, binary releases)
custom_domains.test_results: Blocked in Limited, Development-Verified, and Full modes
custom_domains.notes: Required for SpaCy en_core_web_lg model initialization. Tested with direct curl and python -m spacy download. Both returned HTTP 403. Alternative pattern: github.com/explosion/spacy-models/releases/* (more specific, may need CDN fallback)

quarterly_review.reviewer_notes: Initial whitelist for PII detection skill. Tested in Code Web (all modes blocked). Security verification pending on Desktop environment (requires gh CLI).

usage_notes: This environment configuration tracks whitelisted domains for Code Web Limited mode
Format may need adjustment based on actual Code Web environment file format
Always verify with security-verification pipeline before adding new domains
Start with most specific patterns (⭐⭐⭐) and widen only if necessary
